## Government Tender Announcement: W6837-234752 - Tree and Stump Removal

### Details for Solicitation #WS4328453397

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites suppliers to provide tree and stump removal services to the Department of National Defence (DND) at Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Kingston through a Standing Offer Supply Arrangement.

#### Key Dates

*   **Publication Date**: April 17, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date**: May 3, 2024, at 14:00 EDT
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: None

#### Tender Status and Method

*   **Tender Status**: Expired
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding

#### Business Requirements

*   **Main Services Required**: Tree and stump removal services
*   **End User**: Department of National Defence (DND)
*   **Regions of Delivery**: Ontario (except National Capital Region)

#### Other Information

*   **Trade Agreements**: 
    *   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
    *   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
    *   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
    *   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
    *   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
    *   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
    *   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
    *   North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
    *   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
    *   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
    *   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Contact Information

*   **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Contact Name**: Casale, Christopher (SPAC/PSPC) (he/him)
*   **Contact Email**: christopher.casale@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Bidder Requirements

To be considered for this tender, bidders must submit their bids and all required supporting documentation by the closing date.
